ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_xphe | |- ( (/) X. A ) hereditary A |
| 2 |  | #P_0xp | |- ( (/) X. A ) = (/) |
| 3 |  | #P_heeq1 | |- ( ( (/) X. A ) = (/) -> ( ( (/) X. A ) hereditary A <-> (/) hereditary A ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( ( (/) X. A ) hereditary A <-> (/) hereditary A ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_mpbi | |- (/) hereditary A |
\
 The empty relation is hereditary in any class.  (Contributed by RP, 27-Mar-2020.)
